restAccounts module¶

restAccounts.createAccount(self, username, password, permission, firstName, surname, initials)¶

Creates an account with the given parameters. Creates a database entry representing the user-account. User accounts can only be created by administrators.

Parameters:
  • username – String to be used as a user-name.
  • password – String hash of the user password to be saved in the Database.
  • permission – String representing the permission level of the account to be created.
  • firstName – String representing the first name of the person the account is associated with.
  • surname – String representing the surname of the person the account is associated with.
  • initials – A string with the Initials - the first letters of each name of the person the acocunt is associated with.
restAccounts.deleteAccount(self, username)¶

Deletes a user-account, identified by the username

Removes a user-account from the database, identified by the username, which can uniquely identify a user.

Parameters:username – A string holding the user-name of the account to be deleted.
restAccounts.getAllAccountDocs(self, username)¶

Returns all the information associated with a user-account.

Parameters:username – A string used to uniquely identify the user-account of which information is returned.
Returns:A json object holding the user-name, first-name, surname, initials and permissions associated with the account.
Return type:A json string
